document.full_text: dozens of drivers, including taxi and bus operators, have been arrested on charges of fraudulently obtaining commercial driver's licenses in a crackdown following a deadly bronx bus crash, new york authorities said on monday.
document.title: new york nabs 46 bus, taxi drivers for license fraud
lines_and_colors: dozens of drivers, including taxi and bus operators, have been arrested on charges of fraudulently obtaining commercial driver's licenses in a crackdown following a deadly bronx bus crash, new york authorities said on monday.
